com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Interface CompoundEdge

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Submove
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedCompoundEdge, CompoundEdge.Wrapped, NextCompoundEdge, ReversedCompoundEdge, SubmoveElement

    public interface CompoundEdge
    A CompoundEdge is an edge in LocalRotations. It starts in origin(), which is considered to be connected to direction().from() with a straight line.

    Refer to LocalRotations interface definition for more info on notation used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CompoundEdge.Wrapped
      A simple origin and direction CompoundEdge wrapper.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectedEdge direction()
      Returns the direction of this CompoundEdge.
      Vertex origin()
      Returns the origin of this CompoundEdge.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the origin of this CompoundEdge.
        Returns:
        center vertex v

      • direction

        DirectedEdge direction()
        Returns the direction of this CompoundEdge.
        Returns:
        edge (a, b)
